meanings.definition: A person who fights or struggles against adversity.
meanings.sent1: The brave battlers never gave up in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent2: The community came together as battlers to overcome the flood.
meanings.sent3: The little battler, a tiny mouse, tried to move a big piece of cheese.
meanings.sent4: She was a battler on the soccer field, always striving to win.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lone battler standing strong became an inspiration to all.

meanings.definition: A group of people engaged in a battle or struggle.
meanings.sent1: The battlers marched forward, united in their cause.
meanings.sent2: The two battlers faced off in a fierce debate.
meanings.sent3: The team of battlers celebrated their hard-fought victory.
meanings.sent4: The battlers on the battlefield fought with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The group of battlers stood shoulder to shoulder, ready for the challenge ahead.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in combat or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The skilled battler swiftly defeated his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The young battler trained hard to prepare for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The friendly battler challenged his friend to a playful game of chess.
meanings.sent4: The experienced battler knew when to strike and when to defend.
meanings.sent5: The determined battler never backed down from a fight.
